Steps to make this thing work:1. Leave switch in Switch/WiiU position and plug into PC with Gamecube controller in port 1.2. Make sure it comes up as WUP-028 when Windows detects it. If you move the switch over to PC it comes as a generic controller and won't work3. Download Zadig go into Options and enable List All Devices3. Select WUP-028 and then click on Reinstall driver.4. If using Dolphin go under Controllers and change Port 1 to Gamecube Adapter for WiiU. It may auto change it but not sure.5. Happy gaming!
